alert.note: Alert for Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 1:09PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pender County through 215 PM EDT... At 108 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Topsail, or near Rich Inlet, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Surf City, Rich Inlet, Figure Eight Island, Hampstead, Topsail Beach, Topsail, Scotts Hill, Woodside and Edgecomb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland Pender
